content: Hello, I need help with a TypeScript project
Hi there! I'd be happy to help you with your TypeScript project. What specifically do you need assistance with?
I want to set up a monorepo with npm workspaces
Great! Setting up a monorepo with npm workspaces is a good choice. Let me help you create the structure.
Can you also add E2E testing with Playwright?
Absolutely! I'll add Playwright for E2E testing. This will allow you to test your application end-to-end.
